content: Assurance of Zion’s Salvation
And for Jerusalem’s sake I will not rest,
Until her righteousness goes forth as brightness,
And her salvation as a lamp  burns.
The Gentiles shall see your righteousness,
And all kings your glory.
You shall be called by a new name,
Which the mouth of the  will name.
You shall also be a crown of glory
In the hand of the ,
And a royal diadem
In the hand of your God.
You shall no longer be termed Forsaken,
Nor shall your land any more be termed Desolate;
But you shall be called Hephzibah, and your land Beulah;
For the  delights in you,
And your land shall be married.
For  a young man marries a virgin,
shall your sons marry you;
And  the bridegroom rejoices over the bride,
shall your God rejoice over you.
